name: Neural Processing MATLAB Kit (NPMK)
short_description: Open source, fast and simple neural processing MATLAB scripts, functions and algorithms. File IO, spike detection, signal processing, seizure detection, closed loop. Functions are compatible with Blackrock Microsystems NEV and NSx files.
